text: Hi all! I'm Kirsty, been using HS for a few years but we've recently moved over to host our website there :slightly_smiling_face:
Welcome <@UGQQFHU2J>! We're excited to have you a part of the party :tada:

WOOT WOOT! - Happy to hear you're website is on the :sprocket: HubSpot CMS. How has the experience been over since you moved over?

How did you move over?
> - Migration
> - Rebuild using a template
> - Redesign from scratch with an agency/in-house?

Hi! I'm a front end web designer working with a company that is building their blog in HubSpot. We have a quick turn project so I've been jumping in trying to learn the templating logic and language. I've fumbled my way through most of it, but still trying to figure some things out â€“ so here I am, ready to learn!
